headline: Verizon Communications Inc. (VZ) Adds 293K Broadband Users in Q2, Eyes 9M Fixed Wireless by 2028
summary: We recently compiled a list of the 13 Best Major Stocks to Invest in Now. Verizon Communications Inc. stands tenth on our list. Verizon Communications Inc.
